_header: If I held the low assize
Subjects: carols, of moral counsel; counsel, moral
_description: Politic counsels — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Lord how scholde I roule me / Of al men I preysyd to be’

CULAdd5943.First Lines:
If y holde the lowe a syseAnd take a ray of lytel
                    pryse…
CULAdd5943.Last Lines:
…Last they falle don in to thy eyThe spores that a bove they
                    be
